content: Fall down the sand slide after exploring the Crouching Tiger Temple Cellar to meet the Xu-Dog. The Xu-Dog crafts Celestial Medicines for you in exchange for Mind Cores. You can craft a total of nine Celestial Nonary Pills with the Xu-Dog. You can find Mind Cores in chests or as loot for defeating particularly vicious foes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Nonary_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Nonary Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Xu-Dog Celestial Nonary Pill'.
The content is as follows:
Fall down the sand slide after exploring the Crouching Tiger Temple Cellar to meet the Xu-Dog. The Xu-Dog crafts Celestial Medicines for you in exchange for Mind Cores. You can craft a total of nine Celestial Nonary Pills with the Xu-Dog. You can find Mind Cores in chests or as loot for defeating particularly vicious foes.
